title: Fishing Pole and Fish

adjectives: Of, about, or pertaining to the act of fishing.
verbs: Intransitive: to try to catch fish.
To catch or try to catch fish.
Catch or try to catch fish or shellfish
To try to catch fish, whether successfully or not.
nouns: A rod, often made in sections, which carries a line used for angling and is used to support both the line and the reel and to cast the line.
A pole used for fishing.
A rod of wood or steel or fiberglass that is used in fishing to extend the fishing line
A fishing rod is a long, flexible length of glass fiber composite, carbon fiber composite or, classically, bamboo, used to catch fish.
Pole used for fishing.
A long (usually round) rod of wood or metal or plastic
A strong upright piece of wood, metal etc. that is fixed into the ground, especially to support something.
Originally, a stick; now specifically, a long and slender piece of metal or (especially) wood, used for various construction or support purposes.
An auxiliary activity
A hobby is a regular activity that is done for pleasure, typically during one's leisure time.
The outside or perimeter of any activity.
Activity done for recreation
A small horse)
A hobby or recreational activity, done regularly.
Outside or perimeter of any activity.
An activity that one enjoys doing in one's spare time.
An activity that a person enjoys doing in their spare time (such as stamp collecting or knitting).
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A fishing rod (pole) with a fish caught on the end.
apple_vendor_description: The fishing pole emoji on Apple devices presents a sleek, modern design with a matte finish and a slightly curved rod, reflecting Apple's minimalist aesthetic. Realistic lighting casts gentle highlights along its length, giving it a tactile feel, while the line extending from the tip is depicted with a delicate, almost invisible sheen. This emoji captures the essence of leisure, patience, and the pursuit of tranquility, often used to convey relaxation, outdoor activities, or the anticipation of a catch in messages shared on Apple devices.
